Cookies policy short description: This website uses cookies and local storage. Disabling them will prevent the use of the site. Cookies are only used for collecting anonymous statistical data. No data is shared with third parties.

Title: Title
Add new subtitle: Play and add your own tasks. Expand the largest task database (over 2000 tasks)!
Game rules: At the start of the game, each player has 0 points, and the game is divided into three stages. You choose which player should complete the task or leave it to chance. The player with the most points wins.
Every level need at last 1 task: Each level must have at least 1 task
The probability of selecting the 60: The probability of selecting a favorite task is 60%. This option is recommended to maintain a steady flow of new tasks during the game.
The probability of selecting the 100: The probability of selecting a favorite task is 100%. This option is NOT recommended. If you have only a few favorite tasks selected, it will repeatedly draw the same tasks without the possibility of selecting the latest tasks added by the community.
General info about favourite option: If you do not have enough favorite tasks, the remaining tasks will be drawn from the general pool.
Payment was successful: Payment was successful. Your payment code

Time range type selection: Selection of time and type (range/specific time) for a task
Time selection in game: Adjusting task time during the game
